name: Froslass

ability.name: Freezing Gaze
ability.effect: When Froslass takes damage, attach an Ice Energy to the Defending Pokemon. If the Defending Pokemon is not Ice Type, Froslass takes 10 less damage for each Ice Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.effect: Generate an Ice Energy and attach it to Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: Deal 30 damage for each Ice Energy on the Defending Pokemon.

flavor: Froslass are horrifying ghosts that steal the souls of their enemies. These Pokemon are outlawed for being demons.
